snippet.title: Red Baron - (1978) - Bally Astrocade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Bally Midway © 1978
[Console] Bally Astrocade
Emulator: MAME 0.219

Another head-to-head duel game, another required game for your platform of choice, another boring port...  and worst of all, this was 2-player only!  Really?  Even the Fairchild Channel F had a computer-controlled AI opponent 2 years earlier!  Stinker.
